author: i_verye_smowt
comment: NECT will be cisco packet tracer DSAG is python (again) but you won't be making a game ADEV and DBAV can be lumped into one module, ADEV focuses more on javascript and html, DBAV more on MySQL. For project 1 you'll make an sql database, project 2 will be some sort of website which is linked to a given sql database (not the one from project 1) ofc some things are subject to change, so take this with a tiny grain of salt
